actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Community Services Block Grant Act to clarify the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services regarding the award of grants and contracts for certain special emphasis programs.

summary.text: Amends the Community Services Block Grant Act to restrict the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services, with regard to special emphasis programs, to awarding grants and contracts to public and private organizations for: (1) rural housing; (2) farmworker assistance; (3) community economic development; (4) national youth sports; and (5) rural community facility programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Community Services Block Grant Act to clarify the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services regarding the award of grants and contracts for certain special emphasis programs.
